insert into five_ed_quality_check_detail (quality_check_id, draw_no, mark_category, mark_content, rule_no, solution_content, seq) values (#{qualityCheckId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{drawNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{markCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{markContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{solutionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update five_ed_quality_check_detail set quality_check_id = #{qualityCheckId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, draw_no = #{drawNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mark_category = #{markCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mark_content = #{markContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rule_no = #{ruleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, solution_content = #{solutionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, quality_check_id, draw_no, mark_category, mark_content, rule_no, solution_content, seq from five_ed_quality_check_detail where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, quality_check_id, draw_no, mark_category, mark_content, rule_no, solution_content, seq from five_ed_quality_check_detail
order by seq asc
